amendment.description: Manager's amendment makes technical corrections; eliminates the designation of the Colville River as an Aquatic Resource of National Importance and requires additional rights-of-way planned into and out of the National Petroleum Reserve Alaska.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 112-540 to make technical corrections, eliminate the designation of the Colville River as an Aquatic Resource of National Importance and require additional right of ways planned into and out of the National Petroleum Reserve Alaska.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (WA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 253 - 163 (Roll no. 392).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Hastings (WA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hastings (WA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 253 - 163 (Roll no. 392).
